item.title: CURL
item.description: As part of my journey as a developer and decision to document my learning, I’ve been thinking of writing a short post regarding curl, here it is. Curl is a command line tool for transferring data to and from a server. Curl stands for Client URL and was developed by a Swedish developer Daniel Stenberg @bagder. It covers many protocols like HTTP, FTP, IMAP, POP3 & SMTP, It usually comes pre-installed in most of Linux distros and modern versions of OS X.
